summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 2.1°C) and outside temperature (up 1.6°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 2.8 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 8681 lux) and cloud levels (up 327 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 14117 lux), cloud levels (up 1906 m), outside temperature (up 2.0°C), and inside temperature (up 2.4°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 327.1m lower than yesterday, 825.2m lower than the past week, 1906.4m lower than the past month.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 713m and a peak of 1594m, averaging 739.9m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.
cloud levels.summary: Partial cloudiness with some periods of sun.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; pleasant, mild temperatures. Also, you’ll experience intense stickiness in the air and very little to no wind will be present. Periods of rain anticipated, partial cloudiness with some periods of sun, and weak sunlight because of clouds. Weather could become unsettled.
